body.p:
Midway Woodford County, Ky. Sept 2d 1864
To His excellency
Governor Thos E Bramlett

Sir the undersigned citizens of woodford County, would most Respectfully petion your excellency. to extend your executive clemency in behalf of peter senate, a poor irishman who it seems was convicted for keeping a tipling House in midway. During its occupancy by the Rebels under Kirby smith. and was fined the sum of sixty Dollars, we would further state that he is a poor Hard working man. and for the Last two years Has been ^living^ a quiet sober life, and if He has the money to pay it will subject Him and His little ones to want. During the approaching winter. and we his neighbors appreciating the marked change in him. Do most graciously ask your excellency to Remit the fine. that was imposed upon Him. by so Doing you will Relieve from suffering. His wife and little ones the coming winter

Wm. N. Thomasson, esqr
N E Martin
N G Roberts
James Ford
